ModMetaData.description:
Altair's famous Robes and Sword from the Assassin's Creed series, including a Toggleable hood!
~ Altair's Robes (with a toggleable hood, thanks to sumghai) ~ Altair's Robes (without toggleable hood) ~ Altair's Hood ( for the one without toggleable) ~ Assassin's Sword

Lavakookie for moral support. Sumghai for the toggleable hood code from his already awesome hamefura mod.
